name: Space SHMUP (Extension of Gibson Bond)
description:
Framework of the SHMUP is based on the tutorial provided by Jeremy Gibson Bond in his Introduction to GAME DESIGN, PROTOTYPING, and DEVELOPMENT (2nd edition)

I extended the game by giving most of the enemy types weapons as well as a new weapon type, the phaser. The phaser shoots two projectiles that wave back and forth as if they are moving on intersecting wave frequencies
